title: The Little drummer boy
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Cynthia Freitag
brief_description: Joyful drumming, youthful voices and glowing illustrations combine to celebrate the Nativity in this film, which is based on the well-known Christmas song. Illuatrated by Ezra Jack Keats.
